name: Bramble
description: There are plenty of cooling drinks you can turn to on a summer weekend, but few seem more appropriate to August than the Bramble. A standard in the UK but relatively obscure in the U.S., this gin sour topped with blackberry liqueur is an excellent drink worth discovering this summer.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine gin, lemon, and simple syrup in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake until very well-chilled, then strain into a rocks glass with ice (preferably crushed ice). Float the creme de mure on top. Garnish with a blackberry.
